statementlist.statement: SELECT users.id, users.name, users.username, users.is_admin, users.languagecode, role.id as role_id FROM users LEFT JOIN user_role ON users.id = user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN role ON user_role.role_id = role.id WHERE users.school_id = :school_id
SELECT role.id, role.name, role.remark, role.permissions FROM role WHERE role.school_id = :school_id
